title: Karthus needs changes
body:
I would like to see changes to Karthus because I think he could use it.  From what I see, Karthus is more of a late game champion and I think these changes would be nice to him.

Q - Lay Waste  Cost: 15/35/45/55/70 Mana
get rid of his 0.5 delay and remove the double damage on isolated targets while buffing his damage so he does more late game.

MAGIC DAMAGE: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 120 (+ 30% AP)

W - Wall of Pain  COST: 100 Mana
Enemies who pass this wall have their movement speed Slow (35/55/65/75/80%) reduced by a large amount and their magic resistance reduced by 15% for 3 seconds.  Movement Speed recovers gradually after 3.5 seconds.

WALL LENGTH: 650/800/900/1100/1200

E - Defile   COST: 25/35/45/65/80 MANA PER SECOND

Toggle On: When Karthus kills an unit, he recovers mana (MANA RESTORED: 25/ 30 / 35 / 45/ 50)
Toggle Off: Karthus surrounds himself with the souls of his victims, draining his mana to deal magic damage (MAGIC DAMAGE: 25 / 45/65/ 85/105 (+ 30% AP) to enemies in range each second.

R - Requiem         Range: Global            Cooldown: 160/140/120
After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus blasts all enemy champions on the map and deals magic damage (250/300/400 (+ 70% AP)

replies.body: You've left him almost mechanically identical to how he is now, save for his Q.  In doing so, you removed pretty much the two most mechanically unique and interesting parts of his kit.  Mastering Karthus means aiming your Lay Wastes on isolated priority targets consistently.  If you remove it, he becomes more of a face-roll character than he already is.

Karth is completely fine bro, granted he along with other champions will be changed as new ones come out so they won't be to weak/powerfull against them.

~ **_Crumbs_**
